snippet.title: Devil's Drizzle | Official Trailer #indiegame
snippet.description:
Devil's Drizzle will be available on PC, and a demo is available now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3035880/Devils_Drizzle/

An enchanting 2D pixel art platformer with an engaging story, starring a brave kid, their trusty umbrella, and Sumerian demons. It features a diverse range of mechanics and level designs, including action, adventure, horror, puzzle, and drama.
